_meta.description: SMS notification sent to teacher about rejection
_meta.trigger: Report rejected or marked as duplicate

value.message: Your stray dog report (Tracking ID: ABC12345) has been rejected. Reason: Photo does not show a stray dog. For queries, contact helpdesk at 8000-123-456.

rejectionMessages._comment: Different messages based on rejection type
rejectionMessages.NOT_A_DOG: Reason: Photo does not show a dog
rejectionMessages.DOMESTIC_DOG: Reason: Photo shows a pet dog, not a stray
rejectionMessages.DUPLICATE: Reason: This dog was already reported by another teacher
rejectionMessages.POOR_QUALITY: Reason: Photo quality too poor for verification
rejectionMessages.FRAUDULENT: Reason: Evidence appears to be manipulated. This may affect your future reporting eligibility.

noPayout._comment: No payout triggered for rejected reports
